Package sim

Class SimulationClass

java.lang.Object
sim.SimulationClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
Simulation
public class SimulationClass extends Object implements Simulation
Represents the simulation.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulationClass

      public SimulationClass(int[][] adjacencyMatrix, int nestNode, double alphaMoveEvent, double betaMoveEvent, double deltaMoveEvt, double pheromoneEvapEvtEta, double pheromoneEvapEvtRo, double pheromoneLevel, int antColonySize) throws InvalidWeightException, InvalidEdgeException, InvalidNodeException
      The constructor.
      Parameters:
      adjacencyMatrix - The adjacency Matrix.
      nestNode - The nest node.
      alphaMoveEvent - Alpha, ant move event.
      betaMoveEvent - Beta, ant move event.
      deltaMoveEvt - Delta, ant move event.
      pheromoneEvapEvtEta - Eta, pheromone evaporation event.
      pheromoneEvapEvtRo - Ro, pheromone evaporation event.
      pheromoneLevel - The pheromone level.
      antColonySize - The ant colony size.
      Throws:
      InvalidWeightException - if when simulating there is an invalid weight.
      InvalidEdgeException - if when simulating there is an invalid edge.
      InvalidNodeException - if when simulating there is an invalid node.
